title: Nazi Propaganda: The Machinery of Hate
description: One-minute skill: Nazi Propaganda: The Machinery of Hate.

hook.text: Joseph Goebbels controlled every newspaper, radio broadcast, and film in Germany.

buildup.text: Nazi propaganda used repetition, emotional imagery, scapegoating, and spectacle to build a totalitarian reality bubble.

discovery.text: The technique: repeat a lie often enough and it becomes accepted truth.

twist.text: Many Germans were educated and intelligent. Propaganda doesn't work because people are stupid.

quiz.question: What is the 'Big Lie' propaganda technique?
options: Repeating an enormous lie until people accept it as truth
